def find_minimal_k(x: str, y: str) -> int:
    x = x[::-1]
    y = y[::-1]
    pos_y = y.find('1')
    pos_x = x.find('1', pos_y)
    return pos_x + pos_y

def find_minimal_k(x: str, y: str) -> int:
    x = x[::-1]
    y = y[::-1]
    pos_y = y.find('1')
    pos_x = x.find('1', pos_y)
    return pos_x * pos_y

def find_minimal_k(x: str, y: str) -> int:
    x = x[::-1]
    y = y[::-1]
    pos_y = y.find('')
    pos_x = x.find('1', pos_y)
    return pos_x - pos_y

def find_minimal_k(x: str, y: str) -> int:
    x = x[::-1]
    y = y[::-1]
